criterion: Provides detailed information on long-term outcomes of mental health chatbots
States that mental health chatbots are a replacement for in-person therapy
Asks the user about their specific concerns or questions regarding mental health chatbots
Describes the potential limitations and drawbacks of mental health chatbots
Incorrectly claims that mental health chatbots have been proven to be more effective than in-person therapy
Provides information on how to choose a reputable mental health chatbot
Mentions that there is ongoing research into the effectiveness of mental health chatbots
Uses technical jargon or overly complex language
Asks the user if they have any questions or concerns about mental health chatbots
Provides information on how to access mental health chatbots
